title: Product Manager, Data Development Tools
description: At Google, we put our users first. The world is always changing, so we need Product Managers who are continuously adapting and excited to work on products that affect millions of people every day.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 8 years of experience in product management or related technical role. 3 years of experience taking technical products from conception to launch. 3 year of experience in data management, metrics analysis, experiment design and automation. Experience in machine learning.
preferred_qualifications: 5 years of experience in driving strategy and solving problems for complex developer tools that are operating at scale. Experience in Generative AI and LLMs. Knowledge of the tools and mechanisms for developing AI and ML models in a high-trust consumer product context. Familiarity with the intricacies of managing data, tracking provenance and controlling data use for training models.
responsibilities: Identify and prioritize the impactful platform capabilities to accelerate development and build user trust. Sequence existing platform migrations with new capability launches to establish the necessary privacy foundations and align with Assistant, Gemini and Google Home roadmaps. Evaluate broader Google initiatives focused on data management and model training to determine if/when/how Assistant and Gemini can leverage them. Develop a strong pipeline of platform capabilities and vet them through a high-velocity experimentation function. Influence product strategy and team culture across Assistant and Gemini working closely with executive leadership.
